name: 5H1FT
description:
You have broken into a government facility to steal the 5h1ft prototype weapon. A weapon capable of shifting into any number of conventional firearms, the problem is, you don't know how to use it.

Your goal is to reach the teleporter in each level, however, your gun keeps randomly shapeshifting... Good Luck! 

Feedback from Ludum Dare can be found at: http://feedback.ld.intricati.c...

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Mouse: Look
R: Override gun
Space: Dodge
